## Documentation Issue
What documentation needs to be updated, added, or clarified?

## Location
Where is this documentation located (or where should it be added)?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] ROADMAP.md
- [ ] ARCHITECTURE.md
- [ ] SETUP.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] API reference
- [ ] User guide
- [ ] Other: ...

## Current State
If updating existing documentation, describe what's currently there.

## Proposed Changes
Describe what should be changed, added, or clarified.

## Why This Matters
Explain why this documentation change is important.

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information or examples.

## Offer to Help
- [ ] I can help write this documentation
- [ ] I can review the documentation
- [ ] I just want to report the issue
